name: 200 KM
description:
200 KM Game by TROL LOL Games

_________________________

Ver. 1.0.0 BETA

In this game, you are a cross country runner, running in the darkness, aiming to walk as far as you can, from your starting point. Save your game and load each time or else your stats will not be recorded. Your stats can be found in www.reachtop.com/game/user/game/

Beta version of this game looks crappy. If this game does not reach enough down loaders, it will be removed automatically by the developer from the website. If there are any crashes or bugs or anything that just doesn't work, please feel free to notify us in trollolgames@gmail.com. We would really appreciate your comments.
